features: Intricate floral design inspired by traditional South Indian 'Raashi Pushpa' motifs. The circular arrangement features a Ruby center encircled by Emeralds and sparkling Cubic Zirconia. The 'vanki' style openwork design provides a unique look that blends traditional aesthetics with modern comfort and wearability.
colors: Predominantly Gold with vibrant Ruby Red and Emerald Green accents. The Cubic Zirconia offers a dazzling white sparkle. Classic and auspicious color palette for traditional occasions.
occasions: and special celebrations. Also suitable as a statement piece for contemporary events and gatherings. A thoughtful gift for Seemantham or other auspicious ceremonies.
description: This ring is a contemporary take on the classic vanki armlet, offering the same timeless appeal in a more wearable design. Crafted with high-quality materials and meticulous attention to detail, this ring embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry. Its unique design and vibrant color palette make it a statement piece that is sure to turn heads. Guaranteed to retain its luster and value over time.
